resources.string: Welcome to use abstract music APP,you can use this application more comfortable experience of music,This application will provide online music,local music collection to share music,the more you provide the account system.In order to use pleasure you in this application,we will apply for permission to make software to work properly,thank you for your cooperation:
To login and play music online
For reading and playing the local music
Application at the front desk service
Used to keep alive music services
Used to control the playback of music
